question.title: Will Christie’s, Sotheby’s, or Phillips report a public auction sale of a painting for at least US$100 million before May 1, 2026?
question.description:
This tracks whether the ultra-high end of the fine-art auction market produces another nine-figure painting result.

`{"format":"bot_tournament_question","info":{"hash_id":"69bd4704b33494ef","sheet_id":268.1}}`
question.resolution_criteria: This question resolves to yes if, before May 1, 2026, Christie’s, Sotheby’s, or Phillips publishes an official result or press release stating that a painting sold at public auction for at least US\$100,000,000. This question resolves to no otherwise. Primary sources are: [https://press.christies.com/section/press-releases](https://press.christies.com/section/press-releases), [https://www.sothebys.com/en/press](https://www.sothebys.com/en/press), and [https://www.phillips.com/press](https://www.phillips.com/press)  The question may also resolve based on [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/faq/#definitions)
question.short_title: Public auction sale of a painting for at least US$1
